attributes.action: Scrap excise duty as all their stated aims can be better accomplished in other ways.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
VED is NOT required (as claimed) to check mot/insurance, these can (and currently are) done by other means (the police are already able to check these from their cars).
It does NOT alter driving habits to decrease CO2 emmisions

It is there so they can get speeding fines out of you.
